verbose_text: A growing body of evidence suggests that MMPs, particularly MMP-2, is upregulated in malignant tumors and contributes to the invasion and metastatic spread of cancer cells by degrading type IV collagen, a major component of the basement membrane.
evidence: MMPs, particularly MMP-2, is upregulated in malignant tumors and contributes to the invasion and metastatic spread of cancer cells by degrading type IV collagen
